text: we're here in Sochi right now just
finished a practice before the men's
competition tomorrow
we're dealing with some super
challenging conditions out here the
temperatures have been very warm and the
builders of the pipe are having a lot of
challenges in getting that shape perfect
how the riders want it it's pretty soft
maybe to yourself to ride on there is a
lot of like wholesome bumps the snow
being warm definitely makes it
challenging for the pipe cutters to get
the to get the pipe to maintain as we
ride it but all that being said when it
is warm they can get the machine in
there and cut it very well I've been
watching the other guys during the
breakfast and the riding level is it's
pretty bad actually you know nobody is
happy about how this training is has
been going and the first contest is
tomorrow and I mean nobody's ready it's
like we haven't been able to practice
tricks we've just been trying to stay
alive every run and it's just been harsh
when you see every other person fall
it's you know something's wrong I think
there is just a few guys who can do
something in that pipe and that's sure
shaun white then i think couples
japanese guys it reminds me of vancouver
actually how it was super bad leading up
to the contest and then it actually got
decent so maybe there's hope if the pipe
stays like this it's not gonna be a huge
show for sure and but i am pretty sure
they can rebuild the v for tomorrow but
i think it might be still up not the
best part
